data.name: FreeStyleFootball - Nicky Package
data.detailed_description:
Special Character Nicky Package

The following items are included:
• Special Character Nicky
• 30,000 Points
• XP which is equal to Level 40


Note
Poistion of Nikki is selectable, but it's best suited for DF.
Nicky is an all-rounder who has abilities of a defender as well as shooting skills.


How to use
DLC items will be sent to your mailbox when purchased.
As you use DLC package item from item locker, you will receive 30,000 points instantly.
XP is included in the character item. It will be automatically used as you create the character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window XP
  • Processor: P4 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 7
  • Processor: P4 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
